document.full_text: three bombs targeting iraqi security forces exploded near government buildings in the center of iraq's disputed northern oil city of kirkuk on thursday, killing up to 25 people and injuring scores, sources said.
document.title: blasts in north iraqi oil city kill up to 25: sources
lines_and_colors: three bombs targeting iraqi security forces exploded near government buildings in the center of iraq's disputed northern oil city of kirkuk on thursday, killing up to 25 people and injuring scores, sources said.
